description: Select to prevent user from overriding existing data.

Single_Legal_EntityObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Single_Legal_EntityObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

validation.validation: The Inactive Tax Year must be after the Reporting Tax Year.  ([Tax Year] / [Company]).
All related companies must have a Tax ID in common with any of the Legal Entity's Tax IDs.
Company Relationship Reporting Tax Year must be starting 2014 or later.
Companies already in another Single Legal Entity relationship in the period.
Managing Company cannot also be a Related Company.
The Withholding Order Type selected is not applicable for the Company.
Cancel W-2s to add a company. W-2s have already been created for this Single Legal Entity.
Payroll already ran for companies within the single legal entity active period.
Cancel W-2s to inactivate the relationship. W-2s have already been created for this Single Legal Entity.
You can't remove this Related Company because there's an existing Payroll Run: [company].
You've already created W-2s for this single legal entity. To change the Reporting Tax Year, cancel the existing W-2s.
